properties.name: JourneyMap
properties.description: Real-time mapping in-game or in your web browser as you explore.

properties.name: TC Node Tracker
properties.description: Allows you to automatically keep track of nodes you have scanned with the Thaumometer.

properties.name: BetterFPS
properties.description: Mod that changes how Minecraft calculates sine & cosine, giving a performance boost.

properties.name: FastCraft
properties.description: Sophisticated mod which improves the client and server performance significantly without any gameplay changes.

properties.name: In-Game Wiki Mod
properties.description: Mod that allows access to a wiki in-game. Supports a handful of other modifications, such as PneumaticCraft and OpenComputers.

properties.name: Waila
properties.description: UI improvement mod aimed at providing block information directly ingame, without the need of opening an interface.

properties.name: Waila Harvestability
properties.description: A client-side add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at. Requires Waila to be installed.
